content: Hey there! I'm currently working on my master thesis in medical informatics and I was wondering if a FHIR OWL Ontology exists? I would like to use it as a unifying ontology in order to map different data sources to it. I found this one while I used Google: http://w3c.github.io/hcls-fhir-rdf/spec/ontology.html. But unfortunately I don't quite understand the structure of the project and the "outcome". Maybe someone here has a little hint wheater such an ontology exists.
@Christian Kamann check here: http://hl7.org/fhir/linked-data-module.html
Exactly what I was looking for. Thank you very much!
